projects/ambientes/01/description: One office, two atmospheres. The Laman project explores lighting versatility to redefine the workspace. In the first configuration, the RGB system creates an immersive, tech-forward environment ideal for creative sessions and brainstorming. In the second, warm, sober lighting transforms the room into an elegant corporate setting for client meetings. The result is a dynamic space that adapts to the function of the moment, reflecting the brand's multifaceted nature.
projects/ambientes/02/description: The Finama College reception was designed to communicate instant institutional authority. The focal point is the embossed logo, anchoring the space and reinforcing the brand. A sober palette of greys, punctuated by institutional red and minimalist furniture, conveys organization and academic excellence. An environment that welcomes parents and students with the seriousness and modernity that education demands.
projects/ambientes/03/description: Sobriety and texture define this law firm's reception. The chevron pattern cladding creates a sophisticated visual rhythm, serving as a backdrop for the brand in polished metal signage. The lighting was designed to enhance materials and create an atmosphere of trust and solidity, essential for high-level legal practice.
projects/ambientes/04/description: In healthcare architecture, warmth is a priority. For the Ana Cecília Lima Clinic, we used light wood panels to warm the environment and reduce the anxiety typical of waiting rooms. The wine-colored signage and diffuse lighting bring feminine sophistication and tranquility, aligning the physical space with the delicacy of the service.
projects/ambientes/05/description: High-impact minimalism. The project for Elen Koc’s Studio revolves around the backlit marble panel, which instantly elevates the perceived value of the service. The combination of natural stone, gold details, and technical lighting creates an atmosphere of contemporary luxury, essential for a beauty and aesthetics studio.
projects/ambientes/06/description: Efficiency and flow. The project for Estapar's self-service area focuses on User Experience (UX) in the physical environment. Clear visual signage and the institutional palette intuitively guide the customer to the terminals, reducing queues and confusion. A functional design that integrates operations with the mall's modern aesthetic.
projects/cenografia/01/description: Monumentality and technology. The Comprint booth was designed to support the visual and physical weight of heavy industrial machinery without losing elegance. The overhead structure acts as a beacon in the exhibition hall, guiding visitors. The layout prioritizes circulation and technical demonstration, creating a robust and reliable business environment.
projects/cenografia/02/description: Total brand immersion. An arena designed to be "instagrammable" and vibrant, where light and reflections amplify the presence of Coca-Cola's iconic red. Floor lighting and LED panels create an enveloping atmosphere that places the visitor inside the brand's universe, transforming physical space into a sensory and media experience.
projects/cenografia/03/description: Futurism and exclusivity. The Motorola VIP Lounge uses layers of neon and indirect light to create a sophisticated "cyberpunk" aesthetic. The design transforms the space into a large technological showcase, where the bar and seating areas invite guests to stay, while the lighting reinforces the brand's innovative and youthful positioning.
projects/cenografia/04/description: Co-branding with harmony. The challenge was to unite two food giants in a cohesive space. We used warm colors (yellow and red) and welcoming materials to evoke "appetite" and comfort. The booth functions as a large living kitchen, ideal for tastings and relationship building, reinforcing the affective character of the brands.
projects/cenografia/05/description: Urban geometry and freshness. The Schweppes booth bets on the strong contrast between yellow and black and diagonal lines that suggest movement. The inclined panel acts as a three-dimensional billboard, drawing the audience to the central bar, the stage for brand activation. A bold design for an adult, contemporary audience.
projects/cenografia/06/description: Playful storytelling. The project transports the visitor inside the Docile universe through organic shapes that resemble sweets and syrups. The intense use of vibrant colors and contour lighting creates a "fantasy" space in the middle of the corporate trade show, generating strong visual appeal and emotional connection with the brand.
projects/fachadas/01/description: The challenge was to redefine neighborhood produce retail. We bet on deep greens and wood textures to instantly communicate freshness, hygiene, and organization. The façade goes from being just an entrance to a visual invitation that anticipates product quality, positioning the brand as a local reference.
projects/fachadas/02/description: Unity in diversity. The project unites two distinct brands under a single sophisticated architectural language. Pure volumes, straight lines, and scenic night lighting give the building an aura of exclusivity and art gallery, conveying trust and high standards to clients.
projects/fachadas/03/description: Energy and contrast. Focused on the automotive sector, this façade uses black as a base to make the brands' red and yellow "pop". The upper linear lighting unifies the building, ensuring maximum visibility on fast roads and conveying a sense of power and speed.
projects/fachadas/04/description: Architecture as an urban totem. Vizion Car demanded an aggressive and modern night presence. We created a façade with metallic volumes and strategic red lighting that transforms the store into a visual landmark on the avenue. The showroom acts as an illuminated display case, showcasing the product (cars) like jewels.
projects/fachadas/05/description: Corporate credibility. For an accounting firm, the image must convey solidity. The use of matte black and white, straight lines, and clean visual communication establishes Coonline as a modern and trustworthy company. The side panel communicates essential services without visually cluttering the architecture.
projects/fachadas/06/description: Electric mobility and urban aesthetics. The project translates Shineray's technology through dark ACM panels and vibrant red accents. The "aquarium" window integrates the store interior with the street, inviting a young audience to interact with the products. A façade that communicates innovation and clean energy.
projects/personalizados/01/description: Award design for high performance. The trophy merges fitness iconography (kettlebell) with human gestures, symbolizing triumph. Metallic finishes and vibrant colors differentiate categories, transforming the object into a symbol of desire and internal motivation.
projects/personalizados/02/description: Materialized corporate excellence. Using blue acrylic and mirrored bases, we created a trophy that reflects MAG Seguros' solid identity. The clean geometry and focus on the central star communicate clarity and recognition of merit.
projects/personalizados/03/description: Celebrating a legacy. For SENAI's 70th anniversary, the trophy unites the transparency of acrylic (future) with the weight of gold (history). The curved shape suggests continuous evolution, creating a commemorative piece that honors the past while pointing towards innovation.
projects/personalizados/04/description: Symbology and light. The brand's mascot (the owl) was transformed into an illuminated three-dimensional piece that stands out on stages and in photos. The use of acrylic layers creates depth, making the trophy an object of decoration and pride for the awarded franchisee or employee.
projects/personalizados/05/description: Sport and memory. Moving away from traditional metal cups, we created a modern silhouette in acrylic and wood. The design incorporates visual elements of soccer (the turf, the crest), creating an object of desire that modernizes the aesthetic of amateur sports awards.
projects/personalizados/06/description: Authorial design medals. We raise the standard of awards by creating medals that tell stories. From the relief design to the ribbon choice, every detail is customized to reflect the event's identity. We use acrylic, metal, and UV printing to create tactile, durable, and collectible pieces.
